title: Black Forest Trifle
ingredients: ['60g (2 oz) self raising flour', '60g (2 oz) caster sugar', '60g (2 oz) soft margarine', '1 egg', '1 tbsp cocoa', '1 (400g) tin black cherries (reserve syrup)', '2 tbsp kirsch', '1 sachet blackcurrant jelly', '300ml (10 fl oz) double cream', 'a few drops vanilla extract', '3 egg yolks', '30g (1 oz) caster sugar', '1 tsp cornflour', '1 tbsp cocoa', '300ml (10 fl oz) double cream', 'grated chocolate to decorate']
